The unexpected beneficiary of years of nasty western US #wildfires has to be the LASIK surgery industry.

#HEATWAVE: #Italy issues wildfire and #health warnings as ‘hottest week’ arrives; 1000s #wildfires recorded in recent weeks, one in #Sardinia ravaged 20,000 hectares/49421.076 acres, via @TheLocalItaly with @Agenzia_Ansa #news https://t.co/16OhpRWbyp #ClimateCrisis #ClimateChange

#Turkey's #wildfires have left little behind, turning green forests into ashen, barren hills. The destruction is intensely felt by Turkey's beekeepers, who have lost thousands of hives, the pine trees and the bugs their bees depend on, in a major blow to Turkey's honey industry. https://t.co/XGbS1MqXAG

🔥〰️🔗🇺🇸 California's second-largest wildfire grows to near 500,000 acres; 3 hurt .. 
#DixieFire #US #CaliforniaFires #wildfires #ClimateReport #California 
https://t.co/1hFyMLkATk https://t.co/mmnCcZrsxE

To fight #wildfires the need is no #propwash the solution a #jetboard system in a box as a #directed_force #motor, 7.5mt each, 45-tons a #tanker, 50-#tankers/#squadron, no #refueling using #magnets for #pumps, tried props a no-go, #fluid_impulse motors work in #space

Need any? https://t.co/saYhKdZU8b

A local resident reacts as he observes a large blaze during an attempt to extinguish forest fires approaching Pefki village, Evia.
